other_tests.findings: Invasive ductal carcinoma, poorly differentiated, involving both cores and measuring at least 1.5 cm. Ductal carcinoma in situ was also seen. Lymphovascular invasion was suspected.
Lesion at the 8:00 position 2 cm from the nipple showed similar findings.
Findings consistent with a benign lymph node.
Large intensely FDG avid right breast mass as well as small FDG avid right axillary nodes and a multinodular thyroid gland with focal areas of high FDG avidity.
